value.title: Introduction to Power BI Embedded | Power BI Embedded Step by Step Series | Part 1
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Embedded Step by Step series. Myself Dhruvin Shah. The entire series is dedicated to the Intermediate level of Power BI folks. value.title: New way to compare Date and DateTime Value in Power BI - August 2021 Feature Summary

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy!
